channel.title: CVE Feed for surakrai -- MIMO Woocommerce Order Tracking
channel.description: The latest CVEs for surakrai -- MIMO Woocommerce Order Tracking

item.title: CVE-2024-5768|2024-08-01T21:18:07.045Z -- surakrai -- mimo%20woocommerce%20order%20tracking
item.description: The MIMO Woocommerce Order Tracking plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'mimo_update_provider' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to update shipping provider information, including adding stored cross-site scripting.
